title: RegisterAlarmStateChangedListener (Method)
text:
METHOD RegisterAlarmStateChangedListener : BOOL
Registers a listener for a change in the alarm state in order to give the possibility to
call its method AlarmStateChanged() in case the alarm state changed.

rows.Name: RegisterAlarmStateChangedListener
rows.Comment:
<c>TRUE</c> when there was no previous listener registered,
<c>FALSE</c> otherwise
